Description: The following statement contains a magic number: this.geolocator = new Geolocator (this) { DesiredAccuracy = 50 };

The following statement contains a magic number: this.geolocator.GetPositionAsync (timeout: 10000' cancelToken: this.cancelSource.Token)  				.ContinueWith (t => RunOnUiThread (() =>  				{  					if (t.IsFaulted)  						this.positionStatus.Text = ((GeolocationException)t.Exception.InnerException).Error.ToString();  					else if (t.IsCanceled)  						this.positionStatus.Text = "Canceled";  					else  					{  						this.positionStatus.Text = t.Result.Timestamp.ToString("G");  						this.positionAccuracy.Text = t.Result.Accuracy + "m";  						this.positionLatitude.Text = "La: " + t.Result.Latitude.ToString("N4");  						this.positionLongitude.Text = "Lo: " + t.Result.Longitude.ToString("N4");  					}  				}));
The following statement contains a magic number: this.geolocator.StartListening (minTime: 30000' minDistance: 0);
